rules_text:
[i](As a Conquest enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it’s defeated, put it onto the battlefield transformed.)[/i]
When Battle for Ivos Isle enters the battlefield, put a decayed counter on target creature an opponent controls with mana value 3 or less. [i](It can’t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)[/i]
rules_text2:
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.
{2}{U}{B}, {T}: Exile target creature card in a graveyard. When you do, create a token that’s a copy of that creature except it’s a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types and it has decayed. Activate only as a sorcery.
